definition: don't think (that)/don't imagine (that)
surname Xiu
to rest/to stop doing sth for a period of time/to cease/(imperative) don't
to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)

sentences.english: You couldn't drag that information out of me.
sentences.chinese: 你休想从我这儿套出消息。

sentences.english: It was almost impossible to get a car mended in Lundazi, or even to replace a battery.
sentences.chinese: 在伦达孜你休想修车，连换电池都办不到。

sentences.english: I am sure I shan't get a wink of sleep all night.
sentences.chinese: 我今天晚上休想睡得着觉。

sentences.english: Wild horse would not drag it from the prudent man.
sentences.chinese: 休想从这个谨慎的人那里探到口风。

sentences.english: If you want to get 10 dollars before you finish the work,you just whistle for  it.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想在干完活前得到10美元，那是休想。

definition: impossible/can't be done/no can do/unable to accomplish
to be carried away by one's wishful thinking (idiom)/to labor under a delusion/wishful thinking
to dare (negative connotation)/to have the audacity to (do sth)
to die without a burial site/to die a pauper/a tragic end
pinyin: si3 wu2 zang4 shen1 zhi1 di4

definition: resolute/definitive/categorically/absolutely
not to allow/must not/can't
hard to say/can't guarantee/difficult to protect/difficult to preserve
unable to escape/can't get out
I'm afraid that.../perhaps/maybe/very likely
(idiom) dead end/road to ruin
easy/with no difficulty
lit. even given wings, you couldn't fly (idiom); fig. impossible to escape
to show understanding/to excuse/to presume/to expect
extremely difficult
as easy as blowing off dust/effortless/with ease
pinyin: bu4 fei4 chui1 hui1 zhi1 li4

definition: certainly/of course
